HEADER.TITLE: The Most Efficient Way to Gather for Prayers
HEADER.SUBTITLE: Easily find out congregational prayers near you

LIST.TITLE: Gender Segregation
LIST.DESC: Distinct features are provided to female users in the usage of the application, including gender filtering and invitation visibility.

LIST.TITLE: Multilingual
LIST.DESC: The application supports various languages, including Chinese, French, Turkish, Arabic, Russian, and even more to come. Feel free to contact us if you can help us translate into other languages!

LIST.TITLE: User Privacy
LIST.DESC: The mobile application does not run any ads, and is open-source for the sake of information transparency. You may find the link to the source code at the bottom of the page.

LIST.TITLE: Easy Mosque Searching
LIST.DESC: There could be places that are unexpectedly friendly and convenient for Muslims to pray their five daily prayers!

LIST.TITLE: Instant Gathering
LIST.DESC: In cases such as funerals where people need to gather as many people as possible within the shortest amount of time, Wahdapp is an unprecedented option to help gathering people for prayer.

LIST.TITLE: Community Bond
LIST.DESC: Wahdapp aims on helping Muslims to create a deeper connection with their own communities and a sense of unity.
